data.title: Cheap
data.body:
‚≠ê

I'm extremely disappointed with the MAXSOFT Hair Scalp Massager Shampoo Brush. Despite its affordable price, the product's quality is severely lacking. After only a short period of use, the brush came apart, rendering it completely ineffective.

This level of durability is unacceptable, even for a budget-friendly item. The purpose of a scalp massager brush is to provide comfort and relaxation during shampooing, but the poor construction of this product fails to deliver on that promise.

I cannot recommend the MAXSOFT Hair Scalp Massager Shampoo Brush to anyone seeking a reliable and long-lasting hair care accessory. It's simply not worth the investment if it falls apart after just a few uses.
